dialog.text: I think we are starting the project today :grinning: How was your weekend?
My boyfriend, Pete, went on a stag-do so I went home for the weekend to see my folks.  Not sure about all this team stuff.  How's your team working out for you?

joins.text: Sounds like you have a good team.

dialog.text: Have you met Tanya yet?  She is such a pain.  She knows everything and she never gives me chance at any of the easier tasks.  Like last week, I said I needed help setting up Visual Code and she laughed at me and said what was I doing on the course if I couldn't even install an app :angry:  Is that the time!  I had better run - see ya!
